name: linter-eslint
description: Lint JavaScript on the fly, using ESLint

scopes.title: List of scopes to run ESLint on, run `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine the scopes for a file.

lintHtmlFiles.title: Lint HTML Files
lintHtmlFiles.description: You should also add `eslint-plugin-html` to your .eslintrc plugins

fixOnSave.title: Fix errors on save
fixOnSave.description: Have eslint attempt to fix some errors automatically when saving the file.

ignoreFixableRulesWhileTyping.title: Ignore fixable rules while typing
ignoreFixableRulesWhileTyping.description: Have the linter ignore all fixable rules during linting when editing a document. The list is automatically updated on each lint job, and requires at least one run to be populated. Only supported when using ESLint v4+.

rulesToDisableWhileFixing.title: Disable specific rules from fixes
rulesToDisableWhileFixing.description: Prevent rules from being auto-fixed by ESLint. Applies to fixes made during saves as well as when running the `Linter Eslint: Fix File` command.

useGlobalEslint.title: Use global ESLint installation
useGlobalEslint.description: Make sure you have it in your $PATH. ⚠️ Using the global ESLint install is heavily discouraged. If the installation is not found, linter-eslint will not work.

eslintrcPath.title: .eslintrc Path
eslintrcPath.description: It will only be used when there's no config file in project (if using a relative path, the file should be present in all your projects).

globalNodePath.title: Global Node Installation Path
globalNodePath.description: Write the value of `npm get prefix` here

disableWhenNoEslintConfig.title: Disable when no ESLint config is found (in package.json or .eslintrc)

rulesToSilenceWhileTyping.title: Silence specific rules while typing
rulesToSilenceWhileTyping.description: Useful when Atom fixes errors on save like `no-trailing-spaces` or `eol-last`.

disableFSCache.title: Disable FileSystem Cache
disableFSCache.description: Paths of node_modules, .eslintignore and others are normally cached

eslintRulesDirs.title: ESLint Rules Directories
eslintRulesDirs.description: Specify a comma separated list of directories for ESLint to load rules from.

localNodeModules.title: Path to the local node_modules folder
localNodeModules.description: Optionally specify the path to the local node_modules folder

cwdIndicatorFile.title: Current working directory indicator file
cwdIndicatorFile.description: Attempt to find this file and use it's location as eslint's current working directory (requires restart).

scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=development cross-env BABEL_KEEP_MODULES=false babel src --out-dir dist --delete-dir-on-start
